game

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • game.Field
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoundedField

extends java.util.Observable

    • Constructor Detail

      • Field

        protected Field(int sizeX,
                int sizeY,
                int sizeZ,
                int winLength)
        This is a convenience constructor for subclasses to set the dimensions of the field.
        Parameters:
        sizeX - the x dimension of the field, also known as the width.
        sizeY - the y dimension of the field, also known as the depth.
        sizeZ - the z dimension of the field, also known as the height. For infinite field height this should be -1.
        winLength - specifies the amount of chips in one line needed to win the game.

    • Method Detail

      • addChip

        public abstract void addChip(Chip c,
                             int x,
                             int y)
        Adds the specified chip to the specified column.
        Parameters:
        c - the chip that should be added to the column.
        x - the x-coordinate of the column.
        y - the y-coordinate of the column.

      • columnFull

        public abstract boolean columnFull(int x,
                                   int y)
        Checks if any more chips can be added to the column.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the column.
        y - the y-coordinate of the column.
        Returns:
        true if the amount of chips equals the height of the field. false if there is still room for a new chip.

      • columnHeight

        public abstract int columnHeight(int x,
                                 int y)
        Returns the amount of chips in a column.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the column.
        y - the y-coordinate of the column.
        Returns:
        an integer representing the amount of chips in the column.

      • inBounds

        public boolean inBounds(int x,
                        int y)
        Checks if the coordinates for a column is within the bounds of the field.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the column.
        y - the y-coordinate of the column.
        Returns:
        true if the specified coordinates lie within the bounds of the field, false otherwise.

      • checkWin

        public abstract boolean checkWin(Chip c)
        Check if a player associated with a certain chip has a sequence of chips that is equal or higher than the winning sequence length.
        Parameters:
        c - the chip for which the sequences should be checked.
        Returns:
        true if a sequence of at least the winning length was found, false otherwise.

      • checkFull

        public abstract boolean checkFull()
        Check if the field is full, i.e. no more chips can be added to any row.
        Returns:
        true if no more chips can be added anymore, false otherwise.

      • deepCopy

        public abstract Field deepCopy()
        Returns an unlinked copy of the field. Changing the state of the copy will not change the state of the original.
        Returns:
        a copy of the field.

      • getColumn

        public abstract Chip[] getColumn(int colX,
                                 int colY)
